content: Has anyone implemented ConceptMap.group.unmapped? I would like to see an example about how to use that.
We have not yet implemented it in Ontoserver and would also be interested in examples / use cases

I have a case somewhere.... something like, the customer has a few specific areas where their mappings are different from the generally accepted mapping, because of internal (mis)use. So the concept map they specify has their own custom mappings for those few, and then refers everything else to the general case
